overview: Terfslurred explores the perceived misogyny of trans identity politics and the intellectual catfights fomenting from claims to true womanhood. Threats made against "trans-exclusionary radical feminists" are matters of fact and a trend that dares to further normalize abuses against women, if in support of (some of) them. Carefully making use of an already-existing torrent of film, TV, and digital content on subjects of biology, feminism, trans-activism, Terfslurred poses a new introduction to gender and the LGBTQ+ rainbow like it's never appeared before.
title: Terfslurred
